text: On vlasten nad nebesami i zemloy: okhranyayet ikh i po Svoyey vole ustraivayet ikh dela. Yemu prinadlezhat klyuchi ikh sokrovishchnits, i On rasporyazhayetsya imi, kak zhelayet. On daruyet bol'shoy udel, komu pozhelayet, i umen'shayet udel, komu pozhelayet. Poistine, Vsevyshniy ob"yemlet Svoim znaniyem vsyakuyu veshch'
